text:
QUESTION 152) The minimum capacity, in BTU/h, of an air conditioner, for environments without sun exposure, can be determined as follows: • 600 BTU/h per m2, considering up to two people in the environment ; • For each additional person in this environment, add 600 btu/h; • Add 600 BTU/h for each electronics equipment operating in the environment.
An air conditioning device will be installed in a room, without sun exposure, 4 m x 5 m, in which they remain four people and have a television set in operation.
The minimum capacity, in BTU/h, of this air conditioner should be
A) 12 000.
B) 12 600.
C) 13 200.
D) 13 800.
E) 15 000.
